Philippe, please annotate this bug report with the specific build number.

Althought the launch view is opening the editor, I don't think this is a 
problem with the debugger - nothing has changed in this code recently.

Moving to UI for comment.

There was a problem with Team earlier that was causing this to happen...were you
using the compare editor by any chance?  It's possible that there may be another
issue that is causing our editor images to be disposed...
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 55539 ***
